featured.text: In addition, the songs are seemingly trying to work some magic—as if, by singing, the mother is saying, “Sadness has already touched this house; no need to come by again.” 53.

other.text: When the shuttle touches the land, a drag parachute opens to steady the aircraft, get the speed right, and help the brakes on the landing-gear wheels to bring it to a complete stop. 49.

definition.zh_def: 觸摸，接觸或感覺到某物。
definition.en_def: To make physical contact with something; to perceive through the sense of touch.
definition.example: She reached out to touch the soft fabric of the dress.
